SEARCH
Package CAMSv2

Class User

java.lang.Object
CAMSv2.User
Direct Known Subclasses:
Staff, Student
public class User extends Object
The User User class represents a user in the CAMSv2 system. Each user has an email ID, password, faculty, name, and role. The role can be either staff, student, or camp committee member. This class provides methods for creating and managing users.
Since:
13-11-2023
